title: StartFunctionValidator
content:
CommentComponent(kind=text, text=Validator of , value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=StartFunction, value=kwasm.ast.module.StartFunction) CommentComponent(kind=text, text= nodes.

From the docs:

  • The function C.funcs[x] must be defined in the context.
  • The type of C.funcs[x] must be [] => [].
  • Then the start function is valid.
, value=null)
